casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
TRUJILLO S244650 Supreme Court of California NOVEMBER 29, 2017 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

Petition for review granted; briefing deferred

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in In re Ricardo P., S230923 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to **328California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
